subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: With Tony Parker’s 34 points leading the way, the Spurs extended their winning streak to 20 games as they took a 2-0 lead in their series with the Oklahoma City Thunder.
snippet: With Tony Parker’s 34 points leading the way, the Spurs extended their winning streak to 20 games as they took a 2-0 lead in their series with the Oklahoma City Thunder.
